positions.Title: Senior Manager, Information Security
positions.Description:
- Security Architecture
- Vulnerability Management (Infrastructure, SAST / DAST)
- Vulnerability/Threat Assessment
- Penetration Testing
- System Hardening (Servers, Desktops, Network, Application)
- Scripting
- Team Lead
- Project Management

positions.Title: Security Engineer
positions.Description:
- Security Architecture
- Incident Response
- Intrusion Detection (PAN, Akamai)
- SAST / DAST (Burp Suite, Checkmarx)
- Penetration Testing
- Vulnerability Management (Qualys, Nessus SecurityCenter, Nexpose, AppDetective)
- SIEM/Log Analysis (Splunk, Syslog-NG, Elasticsearch)
- Data Loss Prevention (Symantec DLP)
- Scripting (Bash, Python, PowerShell, regex, awk, sed)
- Compliance (FedRAMP)

positions.Company: Warner Bros. Entertainment Group of Companies
positions.Title: Information Security Engineer
positions.Description:
- Security Architecture
- Incident Response
- Intrusion Detection (Sourcefire, Snort, HP TippingPoint, Tripwire, Honeyd)
- Penetration Testing (Burp Suite, CORE Impact, Metasploit, Kali)
- Vulnerability Management (Qualys, eEye Retina, Nessus, Webinspect)
- Malware Analysis (IDA Pro, Damballa)
- Forensics (Encase Enterprise, Helix, Volatility, Daemonlogger, Xplico)
- SIEM/Log Analysis (IBM Qradar, Splunk, LogLogic, Syslog-NG)
- Data Loss Prevention (Symantec DLP)
- Scripting (Bash, Python, Perl, regex, awk, sed)
- Compliance (PCI-DSS, SOX, ISO 27002)

positions.Company: Warner Bros. Entertainment Group of Companies

skills: Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI DSS)
